subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A team doctor on Tuesday found that the Los Angeles Dodgers’ closer, Takashi Saito, had a sprained ligament in his pitching elbow. He will not play for at least six weeks.
snippet: A team doctor on Tuesday found that the Los Angeles Dodgers’ closer, Takashi Saito, had a sprained ligament in his pitching elbow. He will not play for at least six weeks.
